
## ``argonFooterItem``

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard footer menu item

#### Description

Build an argon dashboard footer menu item

#### Usage
<pre><code>

argonFooterItem(..., src = NULL)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments

* ... Item name.
* src Item external link.
